name: Clutch (itch)
description:
Your ducklings are having a fun time surveying their new surroundings, but they've become scattered. Explore the world and track them down, or just enjoy the scenery. Meet different forms of wildlife and discover new places.

What Is Clutch?

A quiet game of discovery and quacking. Swim through small, handcrafted areas and locate your missing ducklings. Currently the game includes four areas:

  • Forest River
  • Island Beach
  • City Canal
  • Frozen Lake

(There are 18 ducklings to find in each area)

Send me a tweet if you find something that breaks the game so I can fix it! Especially if you're on Linux/Mac since I have no good way to test there.

You can play the full Forest River area in the free demo, or pay at least $4 and play everything.
